Email notifications.Will alert_Sea: Will alert you a specific number of days before the Estimated Time of Arrival of an import shipment.
Email notifications.Will alert_Export: Will alert you when an export shipment arrives to its destination.
Email notifications.Operation_Operation: Operation detail changes that are not updates to the departure or arrival dates of the shipment.
Email notifications.Number of days_Surcharge: Number of days to notify before a surcharge expires
Email notifications.Number of days_Freight: Number of days to notify before a freight rate expires
Email notifications.Will alert_Import: Will alert when the departure date of and import shipment of you is set.
